text: Joseph Arthur Edwards (5 March 1907 – 1997) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town. ==References== Category:1907 births Category:1997 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:English Football League players Category:Chesterfield F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Bolsover Colliery F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Ollerton Colliery F.C. players
title: Joe Edwards (footballer, born 1907)
